trans-unit.source: Specifies the type of unit that is used by the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.ScrollUnit" /> attached property.
trans-unit.target: Especifica o tipo de unidade que é usado pela propriedade anexada <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.ScrollUnit" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.ScrollUnit" /> is measured in terms of the items that are displayed in the panel.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.ScrollUnit" /> é medido em termos de itens que são exibidos no painel.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.ScrollUnit" /> is measured in terms of [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.ScrollUnit" /> é medido em termos de [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)].
